** Testing errors generated by relational operators  MEDIUM**

<<<driver program>>>
start
    declare a,b:integer;
    declare c,d:real;
    declare e,f:boolean;
    e := 8 <= b;                ** No Error **
    e := 8.7 != (d+8.7/c+a/b);              ** No Error **
    e := 3 < 4.6;               ** Error :- Both the operands should be of same type **
    f := a >= d;                ** Error :- Both the operands should be of same type **
    e := f == false;            ** Error :- Cannot have boolean as an operand **
    a := 4 > 9;                 ** Error :- Result is always a boolean **
end
